content: this potholder is part of my ** farmhouse collection 1 ** of tapestry crochet potholders being made in tapestry crochet this potholder is compact doesn t have any holes and is very functional **materials** 3 0-mm d/3 usa 11 uk crochet hook dk group 3 light cotton yarn 15 wpi in two contrasting colors i will refer to them as contrasting a and b tapestry needle **gauge** 28 single_crochet for 26 row in 4 10 cm worked in tapestry crochet **size** 6 7 17 cm by 7 3 18 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/farmhouse-potholders-collection
